verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's son - in - law and senior adviser , Jared Kushner ,] [V: had] [ARG1: his White House security clearance restored Wednesday] , a person familiar with the matter said , after months of uncertainty stemming in part from his role in the ongoing investigation by special counsel Robert Mueller .

President Donald Trump 's son - in - law and senior adviser , Jared Kushner , had [ARG1: his White House security clearance] [V: restored] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] , a person familiar with the matter said , after months of uncertainty stemming in part from his role in the ongoing investigation by special counsel Robert Mueller .
